title: what factors may interfere  with it when we use FMC?
answer:
1) Our FMC supports 802.11b/802.11g and it works at the 2.4GHZ frequency band which is for the ISM use. For example, Bluetooth and Micro-wave oven working at the same frequency band with FMC may interfere with FMC.
2) A building or a wall can also obstruct the transportation of radio signal and the strength of signal would be attenuated.
